Text:
Friendz,
VHS kafi old hain agar aap kahein tu Aur old iz gold up karon vhs tu kafi hain print so so hain ..
I M WAITING 4 UR OPINION OR COMMENTS
THANKS
sirji, movie is good so as print too is fine. kripa kijiye agar ek shriman ek shrimati starring Shashi Kapoor ho to upload karen ... thanks

Malik bhai yeh Goldies aap koye bhi format mein zaroor share karen, VHS,VCD etc,  bahut saari toh market mein nahin hain aur phir VHS complete version hai, nayee market walli kafi cuts hain... ek naya example, TEESRI MANZIL, ek print nahin hai town mein jo complete HAI, AGAR aap ke pass VHS hai toh pls share karna, bahut meherbani hogee, cheers :)

sirjee 'old iz gold' ke under aap kafi rare movies upload kar rahe hai,apka behad shukriya... bas ek req hai ki jo movies crittically acclaimed hai aur market me available hi nahi hai jaise ki 'anantyatra','antarnaad','ye woh manzil toh nahi'. plz inpar bhi gaur farmaye... waise aap jo bhi upload kare wo humare liye nayab hi hai

MALIKJEE, YOUR LOGKYAKAHENGE WAS A GREAT UPLOAD. A RADICAL AND REVOLUTIONARY MOVIE,  BR ISHARA AT HIS CONTROVERSIAL BEST. CURRENTLY, WATCHING OONCH-NEECH-BEECH. I DOWNLOADED IT RELUCTANTLY SINCE I HAVE NEVER HEARD OF IT, AND THERE IS NOTHING ON NET FOR IT, BUT I M PLEASANTLY SURPRISED SINCE FROM WHAT I HAVE WATCHED OF INITIAL 20 MINS MOVIE, IT LOOKS YET ANOTHER GREAT ONE FROM YOU. THANKS A LOT FOR ALL THESE GEMS - YOUR FAN - LOVEPAREEK.
